pages.title: Werewolf
pages.text: A $(item)Villager$() that has become infected with $(l:observations/lycanthropy)Lycanthropy$(/l). During daytime, it is indistinguishable from all the other Villagers, but when there is a $(item)Full Moon$() they will transform into their $(item)Wolfman$() form and attack players and villagers alike.

pages.title: Countering Werewolves
pages.text: Werewolves in their Wolfman form are very hard to kill, being naturally resistant to most forms of damage. $(item)Silver$() or $(item)Silvered$() weapons are known to damage them the most.$(p)A $(l:herbology/herbology#wolfsbane)Wolfsbane$(/l) flower is known to be able to detect an infected villager, as they'll tend to flee from a player holding it.
